title: Blended Learning-Based Professional Development Program for Elementary Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning course for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to strengthen mathematics pedagogy expertise using simulations and VR technology for field-oriented learning

learning_goals: Participants achieve competency in designing three or more teaching methods using math concept visualization tools in blended learning environments
Participants collaboratively develop one math lesson applicable to real classroom settings with peer teachers during face-to-face workshops
Participants master five math education theories through online modules and achieve over 80% proficiency in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
